contents.text: Welcome to NinjaRMM, where we turbocharge your IT stack with the best remote monitoring and management platform.
Press 1 for sales and new account inquiries, including demos and pricing.
Press 1 to schedule a demo of our RMM platform.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist to arrange your personalized demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized NinjaRMM demo at the earliest available time
I’d like to arrange a personalized NinjaRMM demo to see how it could support my veteran outreach programs.
Schedule a hands-on demo of NinjaRMM with a focus on API integrations and custom alerting workflows.
Could you help me arrange a personal walkthrough of your monitoring software?
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of NinjaRMM to see how it can monitor my university lab computers.

contents.text: Press 2 for pricing, plans, and purchase options.
One moment please while we transfer you to our sales team to discuss pricing and plans.

navigationGoals: Get a detailed quote on NinjaRMM plans, features, and pricing
I need to review pricing options and veteran discount plans before upgrading my NinjaRMM subscription.
Get a detailed breakdown of NinjaRMM’s pricing tiers, licensing models, and cost per managed endpoint.
I need an explanation of your subscription plans and associated costs.
I need information on student or academic pricing plans and purchase options for NinjaRMM.

contents.text: Press 2 for technical support and account assistance.
Press 1 for technical support and troubleshooting.
Connecting you to our technical support team. Please hold while we assist you.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a remote monitoring agent error on my endpoints
I’m experiencing errors deploying the NinjaRMM agent on my network and need technical assistance.
Troubleshoot intermittent offline status of remote agents and resolve last-check-in failures on my devices.
I'm having trouble with the software and need step-by-step technical support.
I’m having trouble installing the monitoring agent on my department’s Linux server and need technical support.

contents.text: Press 2 for billing, licensing, and account questions.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and account services team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy on my account and update my payment method
I want to update my billing details, review my license, and apply any available veteran discount.
Clarify my subscription’s billing cycle and add extra endpoint licenses with prorated billing adjustments.
I have questions about my invoice and renewing my license.
I need to discuss our current education licensing and billing details, and apply any student discounts.
